title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for to show f(0) = 0

Method 1:

f is continuous at 0, so f(0)= lim x→0 f(x)=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45B0@

Method 2:

f(0)=f(0+0)= f(0)+f(0) 1−f(0)f(0) f(0)( 1− [ f(0) ] 2 )=2f(0) f(0)( −1− [ f(0) ] 2 )=0 f(0)=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7282@
